title: Businessweek Extra - Tilman Fertitta
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra - Tilman Fertitta
description:
Hosted by Jason Kelly.

Featuring an in-depth conversation with Tilman Fertitta, Landry’s chief executive officer and owner of the Houston Rockets

To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.
